title: API Integration Delays
description: Third-party API documentation is incomplete, causing potential delays in backend integration
mitigationPlan: Contact vendor for detailed documentation and establish fallback plan

title: Budget Overrun Risk
description: Current spending pace indicates potential budget overrun in Q2
mitigationPlan: Review scope and prioritize essential features, negotiate additional budget if needed

title: Vendor Selection Delays
description: Extended evaluation process for marketing automation platforms
mitigationPlan: Set firm decision deadline and establish evaluation criteria

title: Regulatory Compliance Changes
description: New financial regulations may impact system requirements
mitigationPlan: Monitor regulatory updates and maintain flexible architecture

title: Data Migration Complexity
description: Legacy data formats require extensive transformation
mitigationPlan: Develop comprehensive data mapping and validation tools

title: Team Resource Constraints
description: Limited DevOps expertise may slow migration progress
mitigationPlan: Engage external consultants and provide additional training
